Because Obama has requested 30min of airtime on NBC and CBS, Fox has now agreed to move game 6 of the World Series to accomodate Obama's purchase of Fox airtime. Source: TrulyNewsworthy.com.
 
 Now I am generally backing Obama, but this is just weird. I'm sure Republicans will be outraged to hear the news. I'm just waiting for the outraged responses....
